column4: I want to install ubuntu without the GUI in virtual environment under windows OS. Is it possible and what is the best possible way ?
install the server version in virtualbox.
Is there any disadvantage of doing it over separate install of ubuntu as a dual boot OS?
or install whatever version you want. and just disable GDM so X doswent start
virtualization will be slower.. but its trivial to do.
